title: The Sunless Parlour
description: Notes, stories and translations by Lara Biuts, author of the novels La Lune Blanche (ISBN 9781409299011 and 9781445237596), Forever Jocelyn (ISBN 9781445204062) and La Arme Blanche (ISBN 9781446157916). “…in a sunless parlour where an old clock ticked in the shadows and a cat slept by the empty grate.” (Evelyn Waugh, Brideshead Revisited)
author: Lara Biyuts
